statements: SELECT * FROM malware_attacks
SELECT attack_vector, vulnerability FROM malware_attacks WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM malware_attacks WHERE vulnerability = 'SQL Injection'
SELECT id, prevention_method FROM malware_attacks ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT vulnerability FROM malware_attacks
SELECT * FROM malware_attacks ORDER BY id DESC, attack_vector ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT prevention_method, attack_vector FROM malware_attacks WHERE vulnerability = 'XSS' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, vulnerability, prevention_method FROM malware_attacks WHERE attack_vector = 'Phishing' OR attack_vector = 'Ransomware' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT vulnerability, COUNT(*) as num_attacks FROM malware_attacks GROUP BY vulnerability HAVING num_attacks > 1 ORDER BY num_attacks DESC;
SELECT id, attack_vector, prevention_method FROM malware_attacks WHERE vulnerability LIKE '%Injection%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM malware_attack_vectors
SELECT vector_name, vector_type FROM malware_attack_vectors ORDER BY vector_name DESC
SELECT description FROM malware_attack_vectors WHERE severity > 5
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_records
SELECT vulnerability_name, date_discovered FROM vulnerability_records ORDER BY date_discovered DESC
SELECT * FROM malware_attack_vectors WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT vector_name, vector_type FROM malware_attack_vectors WHERE vector_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT vulnerability_name, date_discovered FROM vulnerability_records WHERE date_discovered > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM malware_attack_vectors WHERE description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT id, vulnerability_name, affected_systems FROM vulnerability_records WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(affected_systems,1) > 2;
SELECT * FROM attack_vectors;
SELECT id, name, type FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT description, name, id FROM prevention_strategies;
SELECT * FROM attack_vectors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM attack_vectors WHERE type = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT id, name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT id, name FROM prevention_strategies ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM attack_vectors WHERE name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT id, name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'Medium' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_attacks;
SELECT id, name, type FROM vulnerabilities WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT description, name FROM attack_vectors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, approach FROM prevention_strategies WHERE name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT id, name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity IN ('High', 'Critical') ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_attacks;
SELECT id, name, type FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='High';
SELECT description, name FROM attack_vectors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, approach FROM prevention_strategies WHERE steps IS NOT NULL AND name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT id, name, type FROM malware_attacks UNION SELECT id, name, type FROM attack_vectors;
SELECT * FROM malware_attack_vectors;
SELECT vulnerability_name, risk_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT description, success_rate FROM attack_methods ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM prevention_measures WHERE measure_name LIKE '%firewall%';
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_attack_vectors ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_system, risk_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT method_name, description FROM attack_methods WHERE success_rate >= 80;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT vector_name, description FROM malware_attack_vectors INNER JOIN incidents ON malware_attack_vectors.id = incidents.affected_vector_id;
